title: Corrupt Seeds
summaries: Corrupt Seeds are seeds which can be planted on Dirt Blocks to create Corrupt grass, which will then spread The Corruption in all directions. They drop from the Eye of Cthulhu and can be purchased from the Dryad for 5 SC each during a Blood Moon in a world with Corruption. In a world with Crimson, Corrupt Seeds can be purchased from the Dryad if she is spoken to in a Hardmode Graveyard(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).

Corrupt Seeds can be used to <linked>farm</linked> <linked>Vile Mushrooms</linked> and may be used to spread Corruption in Crimson worlds. In the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked> and <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, Corrupt Seeds cannot be obtained within Crimson worlds and must instead be brought over from a Corrupt world.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, Corrupt Seeds can also be planted on <linked>Mud Blocks</linked> to create <linked>Corrupt Jungle grass</linked>.

statistics.Max stack: 9999 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 99 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Buy: 5 SC
statistics.Sell: 1 SC
